## Summary

This report summarises data from `r format(params$date_from, "%b %d %Y")` to `r format(params$date_to, "%b %d %Y")`, within `r params$division`.

## Themes

### What could we do better?

```{r, results = "asis"}

calculate_table(
  table_data = params$data, 
  count_column = "super_category",
  comment_type = "improve", 
  click_column = NULL
) %>% 
  pander::pandoc.table()

```

### What did we do well?

```{r, results = "asis"}

calculate_table(
  table_data = params$data, 
  count_column = "super_category",
  comment_type = "best", 
  click_column = NULL
) %>% 
  pander::pandoc.table()

```
